description: There’s something about snow flurries and frigid temps that some dogs just can’t resist – and the Powder Hound™ is the hybrid jacket designed just for them. It offers the warmth of synthetic insulation with the range of motion of technical stretch fabric. This weather resistant and insulated jacket is built for winter, and with it, your dog will be set to hightail it to the nearest powder stash.
name: Powder Hound Jacket
